name: Day 1: Smart Animate
description:
Welcome to day 1 of 15 in the Figma prototype challenge! This challenge is focused on Smart Animate and using it to recreate a collapsing/expanding music player. In the file you will find:

  1. A Gif demonstrating the animation
  2. A workspace for you to build your prototype
  3. The built out prototype to use as reference
  4. Community examples demonstrating more advanced application of Smart Animate


Feel free to follow the prompt or create a new, unique prototype using Smart Animate. Whatever you choose to do, don't forget to post a Remix or publish a new Community File with the tag FigmaPrototypeChallenge! Happy prototyping! ðŸŽ‰
